original_text: And you took your sons and your daughters, whom you had borne to me, and these you sacrificed to them to be devoured. Were your whorings so small a matter
korean_text: 또 네가 나를 위하여 낳은 네 자녀를 그들에게 데리고 가서 드려 제물로 삼아 불살랐느니라 네가 네 음행을 작은 일로 여겨서

sentences.original_text: And you took your sons and your daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 네 아들들과 딸들을 데려갔고

sentences.original_text: whom you had borne to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네가 나를 위해 낳은 자들이었는데

sentences.original_text: and these you sacrificed to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 이들을 그들에게 제물로 바쳤고

sentences.original_text: Were your whorings so small a matter
